hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.SFM Wolfos Grotto Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key Ring# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that you must read the names of "Special Deal" items in shops carefully.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the castle guards' routes have major security vulnerabilities.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Barinade#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #2# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
